snippet: Wolfram Alpha Pro’s creator wants his “computational knowledge engine” to appeal to more than math and science enthusiasts.
abstract: Search engine Wolfram Alpha introduces its new Wolfram Alpha Pro version, described by creator Stephen Wolfram as a 'computational knowledge engine' designed to appeal to more than math and science enthusiasts; new premium version does not forage the Web, but instead culls its own painstakingly curated database to find answers for the average user.
lead_paragraph: Wolfram Alpha Pro’s creator wants his “computational knowledge engine” to appeal to more than math and science enthusiasts.

headline.seo: Wolfram, a Search Engine, Finds Answers Within Itself
headline.main: Wolfram, a Search Engine, Finds Answers Within Itself
headline.print_headline: Wolfram, a Search Engine, Finds Answers Within Itself
